titleStmt.title: A testimony of the ministers in the province of Essex, to the trueth of Iesus Christ, and to the solemn league and covenant; as also against the errors, heresies, and blasphemies of these times, and the toleration of them. Sent up to the ministers within the province of London, subscribers of the first testimony.
titleStmt.author: Biddle, John, 1615-1662, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Tho. Underhill at the Bible in Woodstreet,

notesStmt.note: Anonymous. Attributed to John Biddle by Wing (2nd ed., 1972).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
